an2.118:1.4: Imā kho, bhikkhave, dve āsā duppajahā”ti.
an2.119:1.3: Yo ca pubbakārī, yo ca kataññū katavedī.
an2.119:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve puggalā dullabhā lokasmin”ti.
an2.120:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve puggalā dullabhā lokasmin”ti.
an2.121:1.3: Yo ca laddhaṁ laddhaṁ nikkhipati, yo ca laddhaṁ laddhaṁ vissajjeti.
an2.121:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve puggalā duttappayā”ti.
an2.122:1.3: Yo ca laddhaṁ laddhaṁ na nikkhipati, yo ca laddhaṁ laddhaṁ na vissajjeti.
an2.122:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve puggalā sutappayā”ti.
an2.123:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve paccayā rāgassa uppādāyā”ti.
an2.124:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve paccayā dosassa uppādāyā”ti.
an2.125:1.3: Parato ca ghoso ayoniso ca manasikāro.
an2.125:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve paccayā micchādiṭṭhiyā uppādāyā”ti.
an2.126:1.3: Parato ca ghoso, yoniso ca manasikāro.
an2.126:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve paccayā sammādiṭṭhiyā uppādāyā”ti.
an2.127:1.3: Lahukā ca āpatti, garukā ca āpatti.
an2.128:1.3: Duṭṭhullā ca āpatti, aduṭṭhullā ca āpatti.
an2.129:1.3: Sāvasesā ca āpatti, anavasesā ca āpatti.
